properties.name: frontend.departures.interval
properties.description: How long (in seconds) the departures page should be shown.

properties.name: frontend.departures.station-name
properties.description: The name of the station to display on the departures info page.

properties.name: frontend.departures.time.critical
properties.description: The time (in minutes) when a departure should be marked as critical.

properties.name: frontend.departures.time.warning
properties.description: The time (in minutes) when a departure should be marked as warning.

properties.name: frontend.pizza.interval
properties.description: How long (in seconds) the pizza-pad page should be shown.

properties.name: frontend.news.switch-interval
properties.description: The interval (in seconds) for switching the news ticker.

properties.name: frontend.cafeteria.interval
properties.description: How long (in seconds) the cafeteria page should be shown.
